EmailTemplate.description: Email used in auto-response for email-to-case cases
EmailTemplate.name: Support: Email-to-Case Auto-Response
EmailTemplate.subject: New case with {!Organization.Name} Support - Case #{!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.SuppliedName},
Thank you for submitting your question to us online. Case #{!Case.CaseNumber}: "{!Case.Subject}" has been created and a {!Organization.Name} Customer Advocate will respond to you shortly.
Thank you, {!Organization.Name} Support
{!Case.Email_Thread}
